description: Online retail platform with high traffic, payment processing, and inventory management

characteristics.name: Availability
characteristics.reason: Revenue loss during downtime - $10K per minute during peak hours

characteristics.name: Performance
characteristics.targetDescription: Page load under 2 seconds, API response under 200ms (p95)
characteristics.reason: User experience directly impacts conversion rate - 100ms delay = 1% revenue loss

characteristics.name: Scalability
characteristics.target: Handle 10x traffic during Black Friday/Cyber Monday
characteristics.reason: Black Friday generates 60% of annual revenue

characteristics.name: Security
characteristics.target: PCI-DSS Level 1 compliance, OWASP Top 10 mitigated
characteristics.targetDescription: Zero security vulnerabilities, full encryption, secure authentication
characteristics.reason: Payment processing requires PCI-DSS compliance - penalties up to $500K/month

characteristics.name: Reliability
characteristics.reason: Payment failures cause customer churn and support costs

characteristics.name: Fault Tolerance
characteristics.target: Graceful degradation, no single points of failure
characteristics.targetDescription: Continue operating with degraded functionality during failures
characteristics.reason: Single service failure should not impact entire platform

characteristics.name: Recoverability
characteristics.targetDescription: Restore service within 15 minutes, lose max 5 minutes of data
characteristics.reason: Extended downtime impacts revenue and reputation

characteristics.name: Maintainability
characteristics.targetDescription: Clean code, comprehensive documentation, low coupling
characteristics.reason: Fast feature delivery requires maintainable codebase

characteristics.name: Testability
characteristics.target: 80% code coverage, automated test suite < 10 minutes
characteristics.targetDescription: Comprehensive unit, integration, and E2E tests
characteristics.reason: Fast, confident deployments require good test coverage

characteristics.name: Deployability
characteristics.target: Deploy to production 5x per day, zero-downtime deployments
characteristics.reason: Fast time-to-market requires frequent, safe deployments

characteristics.name: Configurability
characteristics.target: Feature flags for all major features, runtime config changes
characteristics.reason: A/B testing and gradual rollouts require runtime configuration

characteristics.name: Extensibility
characteristics.target: Plugin architecture for payment providers and shipping carriers
characteristics.targetDescription: Add new integrations without core changes
characteristics.reason: Business growth requires easy integration of new partners

characteristics.name: Interoperability
characteristics.target: RESTful APIs, standard data formats (JSON), webhook support
characteristics.targetDescription: Integrate with 20+ third-party services (payment, shipping, analytics)
characteristics.reason: E-commerce requires many integrations (Stripe, PayPal, ShipStation, etc.)

characteristics.name: Usability
characteristics.targetDescription: Intuitive checkout flow, mobile-optimized, accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA)

keyScenarios.description: Process payments securely with 99.9% success rate
Deploy new features 5x per day without downtime
